divs: Sighting Details1: We were in the mountains near the Methodist Camp sitting around the fire. 2: I was looking for satellites or shooting stars, and noticed a bright star moving very quickly across the sky. 3: I thought it might have been the International Space Station. 4: The larger star-like object was moving in a straight line across the sky followed by a smaller dimmer star-like object. Both were following the same track across the sky, never deviated from distance between each other, was to high and fast to be any aircraft. 5: Was very curious about the objects and what they were doing or what it could be. 6: The objects passed across the sky behind the mountain.
Summary: Bright Star-like orb followed by dimmer Star-like orb
trends: There have been no other sightings in Fairfield
This sighting has never been favorited.
